documentation.title: Array Declaration Spacing
documentation.standard: When a multi-item array uses keys, each key/value pair must start on a new line.

code.title: Valid: Only one key/value pair per line on a multi-item array.
Invalid: Single line multi-item array using keys.

documentation.standard: Each item in a multi-line array must be on a new line.

code.title: Valid: Only one array item per line.
Invalid: More than one item per line in a multi-line array.
